text:
After authorization, the admin app /admin/contextAdmin/contextList.jsp fails.
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/tomcat/util/log/Logger at
contextAdmin.contextList_1._jspService(contextList_1.java:67)
creator: pbwest@powerup.com.au
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Make sure you enable the admin as trusted ( tomcat.sh run -enableAdmin ).
Or edit the trusted attribute for /admin.
The error is a result of not having the "internal" objects available - and
that's what happens for all untrusted apps.
